title: Add option to increase the connection attempt limit beyond 20
author: t82t
body_snippet:
<!--- Currently no option to increase the connection attempt limit beyond 20-->

## Expected Behavior
Have the option to increase connection attempts beyond 20 to keep RDP sessions online when losing network connection for a few minutes.

## Current Behavior
If you lose network access for a while, for example when putting the laptop into standby, resume it at home and login with VPN 20 connection attempts are usually not sufficient - so you lose connection to all RDP sessions and have to r...

iterations.description: The request is a clear, low-risk enhancement with defined behavior and an obvious implementation point where the reconnection count cap is currently hard-limited to 20.
The issue is a clear enhancement request to make the current 20-attempt cap configurable for users who need higher retry limits.

notes:
AI triage (codex): The request is a clear, low-risk enhancement with defined behavior and an obvious implementation point where the reconnection count cap is currently hard-limited to 20.
Approach: Increase the RDP reconnection numeric maximum beyond 20 and keep validation aligned with that new upper bound so higher values persist and flow to RDP MaxReconnectAttempts.
AI triage (codex): The issue is a clear enhancement request to make the current 20-attempt cap configurable for users who need higher retry limits.
Approach: Introduce a configurable max connection-attempt setting with validation, use it in retry logic, and expose it in the Options UI.
